train_utils module¶

train_utils.get_all_labels(train_pickle_file)[source]¶

This function gets list of labels from the pickle file of labeled data Param : train_pickle_file Param-type : pickle file of multiple jsons with list of bbox, word and cat. Returns : list of labels

train_utils.prepare_dataloader(pickle_file_path, image_dir)[source]¶

This create torch data loader object from CORDDataset Class Param : pickle_file_path Param-type : string, path of pickle file Param : image_dir Param-type : string, path of image_dir Returns : dataloader

train_utils.train_model(train_dataloader, labels)[source]¶

This function trains the model Param : train_dataloader Param-type : torch data-loader, Dataloader object of training data Param : labels Param-type : list, list of labels Returns : model
